appShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the app's name.

appDescription.message:
BACKUP YOUR BOOKMARKS BEFORE USING THIS!!! This addon is still experimental!!!

Filtering is better than searching!
It suffixes all your bookmarks with the name of their folders, domains, parts of the URL.

F is for Folder
D is for domain name
P is for URL path
